args: set -euo pipefail;echo  Exporting env;export BACKUP_FILE=/backup/backup.$(date -u +'%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ').gzip.sql;echo  Writing target file: /backup/0-backup-target.txt;printf "${BACKUP_FILE}" > /backup/0-backup-target.txt;echo  Taking backup: $(cat '/backup/0-backup-target.txt');mariadb-dump --user=${MARIADB_OPERATOR_USER} --password=${MARIADB_OPERATOR_PASSWORD} --host=mariadb-cluster.openstack.svc.cluster.openstack --port=3306 --single-transaction --events --routines --all-databases --verbose > $(cat '/backup/0-backup-target.txt')
initContainers.name: mariadb

initContainers.name: mariadb

args: set -euo pipefail;echo  Exporting env;export BACKUP_FILE=/backup/backup.$(date -u +'%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ').gzip.sql;echo  Writing target file: /backup/0-backup-target.txt;printf "${BACKUP_FILE}" > /backup/0-backup-target.txt;echo  Taking backup: $(cat '/backup/0-backup-target.txt');mariadb-dump --user=${MARIADB_OPERATOR_USER} --password=${MARIADB_OPERATOR_PASSWORD} --host=mariadb-cluster.openstack.svc.cluster.openstack --port=3306 --single-transaction --events --routines --all-databases --verbose > $(cat '/backup/0-backup-target.txt')

command: if [ ! -z "$(cat /etc/pod-info/skipPreStopChecks)" ]; then exit 0; fi; rabbitmq-upgrade await_online_quorum_plus_one -t 604800 && rabbitmq-upgrade await_online_synchronized_mirror -t 604800 || true && rabbitmq-upgrade drain -t 604800

cp /tmp/erlang-cookie-secret/.erlang.cookie /var/lib/rabbitmq/.erlang.cookie && chmod 600 /var/lib/rabbitmq/.erlang.cookie ; cp /tmp/rabbitmq-plugins/enabled_plugins /operator/enabled_plugins ; echo '[default]' > /var/lib/rabbitmq/.rabbitmqadmin.conf && sed -e 's/default_user/username/' -e 's/default_pass/password/' /tmp/default_user.conf >> /var/lib/rabbitmq/.rabbitmqadmin.conf && chmod 600 /var/lib/rabbitmq/.rabbitmqadmin.conf ; sleep 30
initContainers.name: setup-container

annotations.kubectl.kubernetes.io/last-applied-confi: {"apiVersion":"v1","kind":"Pod","metadata":{"annotations":{},"name":"tempest-runner","namespace":"openstack"},"spec":{"containers":[{"args":["apt update \u0026\u0026 apt install -y kubectl get svc -n openstack git gcc libffi-dev libssl-dev python3-dev curl \u0026\u0026 \\\npip install tempest \u0026\u0026 \\\nmkdir -p /tempest/logs \u0026\u0026 cd /tempest \u0026\u0026 \\\ntempest init . \u0026\u0026 \\\ncp /etc/tempest.conf /tempest/etc/tempest.conf \u0026\u0026 \\\necho \"Tempest Ready. Attach and run manually.\"\nsleep infinity\n"],"command":["/bin/sh","-c"],"image":"python:3.10-slim","name":"tempest","resources":{"limits":{"cpu":"1","memory":"2Gi"},"requests":{"cpu":"500m","memory":"1Gi"}},"volumeMounts":[{"mountPath":"/etc/tempest.conf","name":"tempest-conf","subPath":"tempest.conf"},{"mountPath":"/tempest/logs","name":"tempest-logs"}]}],"restartPolicy":"Never","volumes":[{"configMap":{"items":[{"key":"tempest.conf","path":"tempest.conf"}],"name":"tempest-conf"},"name":"tempest-conf"},{"emptyDir":{},"name":"tempest-logs"}]}}

args:
apt update && apt install -y kubectl get svc -n openstack git gcc libffi-dev libssl-dev python3-dev curl && \
pip install tempest && \
mkdir -p /tempest/logs && cd /tempest && \
tempest init . && \
cp /etc/tempest.conf /tempest/etc/tempest.conf && \
echo "Tempest Ready. Attach and run manually."
sleep infinity
containers.name: tempest

conditions.message: Taint manager: deleting due to NoExecute taint

annotations.kubectl.kubernetes.io/last-applied-confi:
{"apiVersion":"v1","kind":"Pod","metadata":{"annotations":{},"name":"tempest-runner-v2","namespace":"openstack"},"spec":{"containers":[{"args":["# 1)   
apt update && apt install -y git gcc libffi-dev libssl-dev python3-dev curl

# 2) Tempest + OpenTelemetry  
git clone https://opendev.org/openstack/tempest.git /opt/tempest && \
cd /opt/tempest && \
pip install -e . && \
pip install \
  osprofiler \
  opentelemetry-instrumentation \
  opentelemetry-sdk \
  opentelemetry-exporter-otlp

# 3) Tempest 
mkdir -p /tempest/logs /tempest/workspace && \
cd /tempest/workspace && \
tempest init . && \
cp /etc/tempest.conf /tempest/workspace/etc/tempest.conf
echo "Tempest Ready. Attach and run manually."
sleep infinity
"],"command":["/bin/sh","-c"],"env":[{"name":"OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_ENDPOINT","value":"http://otlp-opentelemetry-collector.openstack.svc.cluster.local:4317"},{"name":"OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_INSECURE","value":"true"},{"name":"OTEL_PYTHON_ENABLED_INSTRUMENTATIONS","value":"requests,grpc"}],"image":"python:3.10-slim","name":"tempest","resources":{"limits":{"cpu":"1","memory":"2Gi"},"requests":{"cpu":"500m","memory":"1Gi"}},"volumeMounts":[{"mountPath":"/etc/tempest.conf","name":"tempest-conf","subPath":"tempest.conf"},{"mountPath":"/tempest/logs","name":"tempest-logs"}]}],"restartPolicy":"Never","volumes":[{"configMap":{"items":[{"key":"tempest.conf","path":"tempest.conf"}],"name":"tempest-conf"},"name":"tempest-conf"},{"emptyDir":{},"name":"tempest-logs"}]}}

args:
# 1)   
apt update && apt install -y git gcc libffi-dev libssl-dev python3-dev curl

# 2) Tempest + OpenTelemetry  
git clone https://opendev.org/openstack/tempest.git /opt/tempest && \
cd /opt/tempest && \
pip install -e . && \
pip install \
  osprofiler \
  opentelemetry-instrumentation \
  opentelemetry-sdk \
  opentelemetry-exporter-otlp

# 3) Tempest 
mkdir -p /tempest/logs /tempest/workspace && \
cd /tempest/workspace && \
tempest init . && \
cp /etc/tempest.conf /tempest/workspace/etc/tempest.conf
echo "Tempest Ready. Attach and run manually."
sleep infinity
containers.name: tempest

conditions.message: Taint manager: deleting due to NoExecute taint
